os:store.os:value: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload.indicators map{ "value": $.value, "id": $.id, "threat_level": $.threat_level, "confidence": $.confidence, "last_seen": $.last_seen as DateTime, "campaign": $.campaign.name, "threat_actor": $.threat_actor, "tags": $.tags }]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 var indicators = read(payload.Indicator,'application/json') output application/json --- indicators filter ((item, index) -> (item.last_seen as DateTime) > now() - |P30D|)
